title: Festival Fashion: The Kimono | Lord & Taylor
description:
Whether you’re attending Coachella, Firefly, Bonnaroo, Ultra, or Hangout music festival, we’re scoping out festival fashion.  We are completely wrapped up in the kimono trend.  Our favorites range from silk robes to kimono dresses and jackets to kimono cardigans.  Explore Lord & Taylor’s Design Lab for floral kimonos and more festival fashion.  

Shop Now: http://bit.ly/music-festival-outfits
